Already have a vault open and want to switch to another one? If you‚Äôve enabled Sync & Backup on your Authenticator App, switching vaults is quick and secure.

‚ùó Before you begin: Make sure Sync & Backup is enabled and that your current vault is fully synced to iCloud. This ensures all your latest changes are safely backed up before switching.

Steps to switch vaults:

  1. Open the Authenticator App.

  2. Go to Settings > Advanced and tap Start Over.

  3. Select Restore from backup when prompted and choose the Vault you want to restore.

  4. Enter the password for that vault.

  5. Enable Sync & Backup to restore your saved accounts and keep them up to date.
